alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Fleming; Jackson; Montgomery; Powell; Pulaski; Rockcastle; Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 4:09AM EST until December 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, scattered snow showers at times and blowing snow combined with very cold temperatures leading to numerous icy spots on roadways. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting between 30 and 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central, south central and southeast Kentucky. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 4 PM EST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS....Plan on icy and very hazardous road conditions into the day on Friday. Additional falling and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. The Friday morning commute will be impacted. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Consider delaying or postponing travel tonight and early on Friday unless it is an emergency. If you must travel, slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions for the state please visit http://goky.ky.gov.
